trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked clear set pen size to (3) go to x: (0) y: (0) point in direction (90 v) ask [Enter an angle between 0 and 180 (not including 0 and 180):] and wait set [angle v] to (answer) pen down move (100) steps turn ccw ((180) - (angle)) degrees move (100) steps go to x: (0) y: (0) pen up if <(angle) < [90]> then say [This is an acute triangle.] for (2) secs end if <(angle) = [90]> then say [This is a right triangle.] for (2) secs end if <(angle) > [90]> then say [This is an obtuse triangle.] for (2) secs end
